meta.title: Foudroyer, indexing tool for google, yandex, bing, naver
meta.description: Foudroyer allows you to centralize in one place everything you need to reach the top 1 on search engines.

content.description: Musculatus est une application gratuite, hors ligne, qui vous permet de suivre vos entraînements, votre poids, vos performances, et vos objectifs et tout un tas de metrics.

label.value: The index at the speed of light

content.description: Foudroyer Indexation is a tool that allows you to index your website on search engines in seconds. Just add your site, click, and voilà, your site is indexed.

features.description: You added or updated a page? Click the button and your site will be indexed.
Simultaneous indexing on Google, Bing, Yandex, and Naver has never been easier.

title.value: The site plan is automatically analyzed.

features.description: We automatically analyze your sitemap and index all your pages in the blink of an eye.
